And even more surprising is that the heavily muscled raccoon wants you to come along with him when he heads to his first competition. Which only causes you to wonder will you and he finally end up together like you've always wanted back in high school.

(Author's Note: Just wanted to let everyone know that no mattter which option you choose please be sure to keep the main character as a human. ...If that's not too much to ask of course.)
1543.title: More Choices.

info.brief_description: Date an anthro of your choice.
info.description: You are a gay male teenager. You are currently in holiday and your life are about to change when you meet the anthro of your dream.
